definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese Medicine Committee of Diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 中國中醫藥學會消渴病專業委員會。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine has a history of thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 中國醫藥學有着數千年的歷史。

sentences.english: Results The pharmacognostic character of Herba Agriophyllum was described comprehensively.
sentences.chinese: 結果詳細描述了蒙藥材沙蓬的生藥學特徵。

sentences.english: The study and use of plants for medicinal purposes is the concern of herbalism .
sentences.chinese: 植物藥用的研究與應用主要是草藥學關注的焦點。

sentences.english: Breeding drugs would be a medical boon .
sentences.chinese: 藥物繁育是醫藥學的一個恩惠。

sentences.english: The chinese materia medica is a course studying the theory and clinical application of chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 中藥學是研究中藥的基本理論和臨牀應用的一門學科。

sentences.english: Chinese herbology presents its own set of research challenges.
sentences.chinese: 中醫的草藥學向人們的研究提出了自己的挑戰。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE:To provide references for drugstores to launch pharmaceutical care.
sentences.chinese: 爲藥店開展藥學服務提供參考。

sentences.english: I see no reason why medical research cannot go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我堅信醫藥學研究一定會繼續向前。

sentences.english: But supporters of Herbology believe it works.
sentences.chinese: 但是支持者認爲草藥學是行之有效的。

sentences.english: He began to take a great interest in conventional medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他開始對保守醫藥學出現了極大的興趣。

sentences.english: Results To put forward some ideas about higher education of pharmacy in our country.
sentences.chinese: 結果對我國高等藥學教育的發展提出了建議。

sentences.english: Len Seymour Clinical Pharmacology, Oxford, Professor.
sentences.chinese: 牛津大學，臨牀藥學系，教授。

sentences.english: Fensuzhen , study in department of pharmacy in zhejiang Chinese traditional medical university.
sentences.chinese: 就讀於浙江中醫大學藥學系。

sentences.english: The hospital clinical pharmacy is precisely this kind of edge discipline.
sentences.chinese: 醫院臨牀藥學正是這樣一門邊緣學科。
